00005 EaglePlan* EaglePlan_New(int pageSize, EaglePageReceiver *receiver)
00006 {
00007     EaglePlan *plan = (EaglePlan*) malloc(sizeof(EaglePlan));
00008     
00009     plan->pageSize = pageSize;
00010     plan->receiver = receiver;
00011     
00012     plan->allocatedOperations = 10;
00013     plan->usedOperations = 0;
00014     plan->operations = (EaglePlanOperation**) calloc((size_t) plan->allocatedOperations, sizeof(EaglePlanOperation*));
00015     
00016     plan->allocatedProviders = 10;
00017     plan->usedProviders = 0;
00018     plan->providers = (EaglePlanBufferProvider**) calloc((size_t) plan->allocatedProviders, sizeof(EaglePlanBufferProvider*));
00019     
00020     return plan;
00021 }

00023 void EaglePlan_addOperation(EaglePlan *plan, EaglePlanOperation *epo)
00024 {
00025     plan->operations[plan->usedOperations++] = epo;
00026 }

00028 void EaglePlan_addBufferProvider(EaglePlan *plan, EaglePlanBufferProvider *bp)

00030     plan->providers[plan->usedProviders++] = bp;

00033 const char* EaglePlan_toString(EaglePlan *plan)
00034 {
00035     char *str = (char*) malloc(1024);
00036     int i;
00037     
00038     str[0] = 0;
00039     strcat(str, "EaglePlan:\n");
00040     for(i = 0; i < plan->usedProviders; ++i) {
00041         strcat(str, "  ");
00042         strcat(str, EaglePlanBufferProvider_toString(plan->providers[i]));
00043         strcat(str, "\n");
00044     }
00045     for(i = 0; i < plan->usedOperations; ++i) {
00046         strcat(str, "  ");
00047         strcat(str, EaglePlanOperation_toString(plan->operations[i]));
00048         strcat(str, "\n");
00049     }
00050     
00051     return str;
00052 }

00054 void EaglePlan_Delete(EaglePlan *plan)
00055 {
00056     int i;
00057     
00058     if(!plan) {
00059         return;
00060     }
00061     
00062     EaglePageReceiver_Delete(plan->receiver);
00063     
00064     for(i = 0; i < plan->usedOperations; ++i) {
00065         EaglePlanOperation_Delete(plan->operations[i]);
00066     }
00067     free(plan->operations);
00068     
00069     for(i = 0; i < plan->usedProviders; ++i) {
00070         EaglePlanBufferProvider_Delete(plan->providers[i]);
00071     }
00072     free(plan->providers);
00073     
00074     free(plan);
00075 }
